steps.conclusion: None. The output follows APP_LANGUAGE=English, includes the exact topic Black Holes, uses single-topic titles without joiners or levels, keeps titles â‰¤5 words, sets is_language_course=false for all, and provides english_title matching the titles. Icons all start with tabler-.
